first_para: Sir Robert Edward Russell (born 31 March 1946) is a Liberal Democrat politician in the United Kingdom who has been an Member of Parliament for Colchester since 1997 (re-elected 2001, 2005 and 2010). He was knighted in the 2012 New Year Honours for public service.

full.extract:
Sir Robert Edward Russell (born 31 March 1946) is a Liberal Democrat politician in the United Kingdom who has been an Member of Parliament for Colchester since 1997 (re-elected 2001, 2005 and 2010). He was knighted in the 2012 New Year Honours for public service.
^ The London Gazette: (Supplement) no. 60009. p. 1. 31 December 2011.
full.title: Bob Russell (British politician)
